name: PC TECH CLINIC
overview:
PC Support Anywhere, Anytime With PC Tech Clinic

     PC TECH CLINIC is a leading provider of online Subscription-based technical support services offered directly to consumers and small businesses across a wide range of computing and communications devices and software.We provide technical support and software services which can be delivered remotely. We currently provide services all over United states, Canada & United Kingdom.

PC TECH CLINIC technical support services features include :

•24 x 7 integrated support through the telephone, email and chat

•Intelligent knowledge base FAQs and solutions database used for information and troubleshooting purposes

•Service request management (the logging, prioritization, tracking, research, resolution or dispatch/escalation and follow-up of help desk cases)

•Escalations procedure management through voice and e-mail
